MS STEEL FABRICATION  AND PIPING WITH ERECTION ONLY LABOUR CHARGES PER KGS  25 X 15000 = 3,75,000 5. 10" MS PIPE & FABRICATION ERECTION EACH ONE, 5000 X 40 NOS = 20,000. 6. FUEL PIPE FABRICATION & ERETION ONLY LABOUR CHARGES PER MTR, 200 X 325 = 65,000 7. 10" BELLOW ERECTION & FITTING EACH ONE, 1000 X 16 = 16,000,  TOTAL - 12,43,000 + 18% GST EXTRA
